## Flyout.createDom() method

Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own SVG element or be a g element nested inside a separate SVG element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createDom(tagName: string | Svg<SVGSVGElement> | Svg<SVGGElement>): SVGElement;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

tagName


</td><td>

string \| [Svg](./blockly.utils_namespace.svg_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;SVGSVGElement&gt; \| [Svg](./blockly.utils_namespace.svg_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;SVGGElement&gt;


</td><td>

The type of tag to put the flyout in. This should be <svg> or <g>.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

SVGElement

The flyout's SVG group.
